title: (46400) Cullera - 47 Carrer Villa Segura
description: It is the end of one of the paths that climb Mount Cullera along the slope that overlooks the coast, following the access to the meteorological radar. The views are spectacular from here. There are no services, not even a trash can, but the place is good enough to spend the night. Of course, I would avoid coming in high season because there are many stops along the way and it seems to be an area used as a riding school or to go up with the car to play music.

title_short: (46408) Mareny de Sant Llorenç - 85B Plaça Numero 19 Dosel
description: Very quiet parking possibility, nicely protected from view by reeds or flowering bushes. About 30m to the natural beach (a beautiful wooden staircase leads over the dunes to the beach, there bird nature reserve), sound of the sea when falling asleep. Were absolutely alone there at night. No street noise, no artificial lighting - complete silence. We cleared away some of the rubbish lying around. No prohibition signs. Driveway a bit narrow, as there are flowering bushes on both sides, but went with a 6m mobile home. Packed with beachgoers during the day.

We had a beer on the terrace of the restaurant La Cabaña, just 80 meters away. In addition, they have an application in which you can see at any time the remaining time for your laundry. We do not like to wait, so we thought it was great.

title: (46400) Cullera -
description: Please let us know before your arrival! Good morning, we are a camper couple who want to contribute our grain of sand. We are aware of the problem for staying overnight, so we put at your disposal our fenced plot of land on the Cullera beach (Valencia). We do not charge anything, but we would like you to let us know before you arrive, you can bring your pet and enjoy it too! We only ask that you be as comfortable as possible, respect the environment, nature, animals and if you want organic vegetables we will gladly prepare an assortment of the best! Only autonomous vehicles with toilets, this is not a campsite and we do not have a public toilet, you cannot go to the surrounding fields for necessities, it is important to respect the neighbors and the environment, we live surrounded by aquifers that could be affected by droppings or urination... thanks in advance! If we all respect the environment, this place will always be available, otherwise we will not be able to continue with this adventure. Thank you for your understanding, greetings?

title: (46409) - 127 Plaça Numero 31
description:
Es un sitio amplio de zona verde,completamente plano,hay ducha,cocina,lavadora y fregadero.
Zona sin ruidos,tranquila y con atardeceres preciosas.
Hay vista desde la terraza a playa y montaña.
Elisabet 625454527

title: (46409) Cullera - 326 Plaça Numero 31 Brosquil
description: Quiet parking lot, miles of beach, only separated by a dune. At the weekend it is very busy with local campers and day tourists. But don't throw your household garbage into the one bin at the site or the one on the beach. They are emptied by the community both on Mondays and so the locals find already filled bins at the weekend and simply put their rubbish on the ground. The garbage is then spread over the square because dogs and rats tear open the bags. 3 large containers are 500 meters away at the entrance / exit. Oh yes, you have to like dogs. There are a lot of dogs running around, including local ones. A drinking water fountain is 2 km away. A semi-large SPAR supermarket is 3.5 km away. LIDL 9 km. It is worth looking at the castle in Cullera, there is a nice inexpensive cafe with lots of tame cats and a half-hour pilgrimage to marvel at. The no-dogs sign from April to September doesn't seem to stop the locals from walking on the beach. ;-) One more thing :, dear campers without a toilet, please take a shovel with you and don't leave the paper lying around, otherwise it will fly over the square and unfortunately all the areas on the right and left of the square where a bush provides cover are full with you human excrement.

title: (46012) El Palmar - 155 Plaça Num 37
description: Very central in El Palmar. Town hall car park right next to the piers for a boat ride through the Albufera. Few places and difficult to get to in the middle of the season. Many restaurants next door

name: Bodega 2020
title: (46680) Bodega 2020
description: We are happy to welcome you in the parking lot of our tasting room. Our car park is an ideal stopover for wine lovers/campers. You can taste our house wines and tapas every day of the week. Free night with the purchase of 6 bottles. Arrival between 12:00 p.m. and 5:30 p.m. We speak Dutch, German, English, French and Spanish. Large campers (>9m) are also welcome. Reservations preferably via whatsapp or email. Saturday and Sunday we are closed!

title: (46012) València - Carrer de Vicente Baldoví

description: Roadside parking sheltered by groves. Close to the beach (public shower) and quiet at night if we ignore the few curious looking for meetings between men ...

title: (46012) Valencia - 54 Calle Casbah Saler
description: Parking 30 meters from the beach. Great views of the sea and the wild place. Staying overnight prohibited

title: (46750) Simat de la Valldigna - 12 Carrer dels Brolls
title_short: (46750) Simat de la Valldigna - 12 Carrer dels Brolls
description:
Simat motorhome area. A gravel and earth parking lot. Problems if it rains not the best.
Services at the end of the street.
Otherwise good for visiting the magnificent monastery of Santa María de la Valldigna, and spending the night there. Gandia about 20 km. Just A few kilometers. Leaving Tabernes beach. With mountain trails near the city.
self-service laundry 8 a.m. to 9 p.m.

Vending machines 365 days and 24 hours a day. nearby

title: (46012) Valencia - 19 Diseminado Gola del Puchol
description: Beach of La Garrofera

title: (46240) Carlet - 37 Avinguda de Vicent Andrés Estellés
title_short: (46240) Carlet - 37 Avinguda de Vicent Andrés Estellés
description: Public parking, we had a good night, bar in front, teenage sea at 600metres, police at 500 meters. Quiet.

title: (46012) Valencia - 11 Avenida Gola del Puchol
description: Parking lot of the day. A few meters from the beach. On the weekends there is a little traffic in the evening, but very quiet and no problem. Very popular with motorhomes.

title: (46012) Valencia - 11 Avenida Gola del Puchol
description: Parking marked to park only during the day but wonderful to enjoy a stop overlooking the beach

title: (46012) Valencia - 4A Avenida Gola del Puchol
description: Very large place to park large motorhomes.

title: (46012) Valencia - 1 Avenida Gola del Puchol
description: Park on the beach in low season, day time only, no camping

title: (46260) - 54 Plaça Numero 36
description: It's a gas station, there is a water outlet to fill, the water outlet is very old ... if you put gas, it is no problem

title: (46240) Carlet - 21 Plaza Perfecto García Chorne
description: Parking in a sports car area but taking advantage of the space in the planter, there is room for a 7-person motorhome. We called the Local Police and they told us that there was no municipal ordinance prohibiting overnight stays in the municipality . 20 minutes from downtown. Quiet area to spend the night. Nice church in the town.

name: Camping San Vicente
title: (46770) Camping San Vicente
description: Camping San Vicente is the ideal place for small and medium campers. We are a small family-run camping site located by the beach with stunning sea views and surrounded by a large fine and sandy beach. Our installation is equipped with modern sanitary blocks and all this at a very economical price during the low/medium season.

title: (46012) Valencia -
description: Parking and naturist beach directly opposite shower and trash

title: (46770) Xeraco - Km. 570 dcho
description: A water tap after the gas station for trucks

title: (46460) Silla - 4 Calle en Proyecto N.10
description: Large free parking

title: (46770) Xeraco - 6 Calle Rondonera
description:
Behind BP fuel station is parking for trucks and cars. Warning signs, that you stay at your own risk (staff said to be careful of theafs, lock the car for sleeping), however all night was smooth, we slept well and the area doesn't look that dangerous. We also weren't the only ones to sleep overnight,few tracks and lorries, motorhome and over car-van. All is free, toilets open from outside whole night, picnic area to eat, drinking water, only no showers!
By morning it gets busy as it's on motorway, but till 8am quiet night.

title: (46750) Simat de Valldigna - CV-675
description: Place with wonderful views to spend the night

title: (46292) sentido - km 378 Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: Rest area with hot shower. Clean toilets and shower, good WiFi and friendly staff.

title: (46292) - 18 Plaça Numero 9
description: Free drinking water with good pressure and free air by REPSOL (just near the exit to highway again on the right)

title: (46770) Xeraco - carrer migjorn
description: Absolutely to recommend the Xeraco Campers motorhome area has everything to seduce: the warm welcome of the owners, flat and gravelled pitches delimited by green hedges and palm trees. On-site water and electricity. New sanitary facilities maintained with showers and sinks. Washing machines, 1 dryer, ironing board, washing tubs, dish sinks... A small grocery store, a dining room and a bar. Dishes to eat in or take away. Wifi up to your location. Sliding scale rates according to the seasons and the duration but affordable. Thousand Bravos attention from 10 amps, pitches have increased to 6 amps

title: (46770) Xeraco - 1A Avinguda Arnau Bosquets
description: Faucet, drinking water

title: (46012) València - 10 Plaça Num 35
description: Facing the very quiet sea in the natural park

title: (46012) València - 10 Plaça Num 35
description: Currently SATURATED with vehicles and it seems that with time restrictions. Before it was a quiet area, with some other AC and vehicles that spend the day on the beach. Beach with a nature reserve for walks through sunny and shady areas. Tracks with bike lanes, running or walks, also nearby multi-sport and children's activity parks. There are trash cans and containers nearby, which at least in June 2022 were cleaned every morning. Beach shower area (without soap) and NON-potable water sources, nearby bars.

title: (46460) Silla - 22-94 Avenida de Gandía
description: Sports complex car park. the chair municipal poliesportiu has free hot showers.. go to the pavilion and ask for them.

name: Camping La Falaguera
title: (46758) Camping La Falaguera
description: Camping, super quiet, in the mountains and near the beach of Gandia, a municipality declared of speological interest,

title: (46460) Silla - 99B Polígono Número 30
description: Old eras of rice fields that are no longer used very close to the town behind a covered pool near a pipican and 500m from the port of Silla, corresponding to the Albufera natural area the great dates are March, April and May in June, July and august crazy hot in september hustle and bustle of tractors for the harvest autumn and winter a walk through the rice fields with the sun is also good

title: (46460) Silla - 50 Carrer de Sant Roc
description: Automatic laundry, opening 365 days / year.

title: (46012) València - Unnamed Road
description: Parking, clean close to the sea very pleasant, it's been two years that we stop there when we pass in Valence never had any problem to recommend any restaurant service nearby. Forbidden to sleep.

title: (46770) Xeraco - s/n Carrer Ronda de Bruguières
title_short: (46770) Xeraco - s/n Carrer Ronda de Bruguières
description: Street parking both sides used by a few HGV overnighting. I stayed here 2 nights (November) without a problem and it was very quiet during the nights. There may be toilets to use in the sports centre. Supermarket a short walk away.

title: (46770) Xeraco - 73 Carrer Ronda de Bruguières
description: Washers and dryers new facilities

title: (46012) València - 533D Carretera Rio
description: Nice wide spot for at least 30 campers. Lots of sun. 200m walk to shops. Close to the sea. Great for one night.

title: (46460) Silla - 7 Calle de Jaime I el Conquistador
title_short: (46460) Silla - 7 Calle de Jaime I el Conquistador
description: Large lot for parking and at night. There are no services.

address.street: 7 Calle de Jaime I el Conquistador

title: (46460) Silla - 9 Avinguda Beniparrell
description: Vacant land, not yet built HLM property. No service

title: (46758) Barx - 205 Plaça Poligono 10
description: Picnic areas covered with a roof. There are paelleros in which you can barbecue according to the level of pre-emergency fire (there is a panel which provides information). There is a small raft ideal for cooling off a bit. There is garbage in the recreational area, although I recommend using the containers on the road.

title: (46770) Xeraco - 8 Carrer Riu
description: Right on the beach. Very good location for swimming and sunbathing. Very quiet day and night. Good for 1-2 nights.

title: (46012) Valencia -
description: El Saler car park. Nice and large parking lot a few meters from the beach. Rubbish bins, beach showers, drinking water fountains and a bar called Mikkenos with public toilets. Nice walk in the nature reserve. Several parking lots with lots of parking possibilities. Schöafen possible without problems but setting up tables is forbidden and the police patrol regularly. Dogs allowed on the beach off-season (approximately from September to May). The bus runs regularly into the city (journey time approx. 20 minutes)

title: (46012) Albufera - 552 Carrera del Riu
description: Bus 25 passes right opposite to go to Valencia, highly recommended. Each plot has its electricity. The bathrooms, although we didn't use them, are very good, with showers included in the price, very economical and you have to leave the next morning before noon, otherwise you pay again for a night

title: (46260) Alberique - 8 Calle J-G Sector R
description: Quiet verge. Can be good for one night in transit. Good emergency sleeping place when it is too windy in the mountains.

title: (46758) Barx - 37 Partida Nevera
description: A nice quiet place with picnic benches and water.

title: (46012) Valencia - Unnamed Road
description: Spacious parking, close to the beach on foot.

name: Camping Valencia el Saler
title: (46012) Camping Valencia el Saler
description: Welcome to the Camping Valencia el Saler Camping Valencia el Saler offers one of the best alternatives in the four seasons of the year, located in the Natural Park of the Albufera (lake, majal, forest and beach) form a unique variety in the Valencian Community to 8 kilometers from the city of Valencia. All this makes our camping a recommendable choice for any visitor, either in search of activities in full nature or visiting the city with the option of using public transport (bus) from the door of the campsite .

name: Camping Park El Saler
title: (46012) Camping Park El Saler
description: Camping Park El Saler is a small camping site with all necessities you need. The facilities are a bit old, but very clean and therefore still nice. It is located close to the bus lines 24 and 25 that take you directly to Valencia centre town. The beach is also in walking distance. Overall a nice place to stay for visiting Valencia!

title: (46759) Simat de la Valldigna - 2A Barri Pla de Corrals
title_short: (46759) Simat de la Valldigna - 2A Barri Pla de Corrals
description: Very large and flat gravel parking area. We enjoyed a very peaceful night here. Beautiful mountain views. One minute walk to local village with a lovely little tapas bar. Rubbish bins, water and large BBQ area.

title: (46758) Bárig - 12 Polígono 08
description: Ample parking in the cemetery. Some friendly locals visit the cemetery. The other place in town was too humid for us.

title: (46667) Barcheta - 7 Partida la Judía
description: Nice picnic site next to the town sports center, barbecue area and children's park we have spent the day but you could even spend the night

title: (46790) Xeresa - Unnamed Road
description: Halfway up the top of the Monduver. A perfect place to leave the car and make a route to the top. The "road" to get here is pretty bad, I don't know if all the vehicles can get there without problems. The views are very pretty. Gandia, Cullera and Denia can be seen if the weather is good and clear. An unconventional place, but recommended to enjoy the views.

title: (46012) Valencia - 513 Carrera del Riu
description: A good way to fill up the motorhome.

title: (46229) Picassent - 4 Camino de la Paridera
description: Just at the entrance of the city. Lots of space and quite calm.

title: (46758) Barx - 8A Carrer Corral Solat
description: Private land in rural area. Total view in the middle of nature, mountains, pines, etc. Incredible views, with a lot of tranquility and peace, where you can bring your pets. Very popular area for cycling both road and mountain biking and hiking or trail with a variety of outdoor activities. There is a town 2 km away with all kinds of needs. At the moment we do not have a water and electricity point, as well as a gray water drain, but we are working on it. Contact by WhatsApp and payment by Bizum if it can be. The plot is completely flat and has plenty of pine trees.

title: (46290) Alcàsser - 3 Carrer dels Velluters
description: Almost in the town center. Supermarket and wheels close to spot.

name: Camping "CollVert"
title: (46012) Camping "CollVert"
description: Camping "CollVert" 200 meters from the sea, along the bike path to Valencia (8 km), quiet and spacious. Services for motorhomes bus in front of the entrance of camping number 25 about 25 minutes to go to the old town which is the terminus

title: (46758) Barx - 20 Carrer de l'Assagador
description: Quiet and shaded fountain square. Departure of walks. Don't miss eating a paella at the Parpallo restaurant (3rd best paella in Spain).

title: (46470) València - 350B Plaça Numero 10
description: Good place to spend a quiet night although at the beginning there was movement of cars. Right in front of the parking lot there is a hiking path and in the mornings you can see people cycling or walking.

title: (46469) Beniparrell - 47 Carrer les Escoles
description: Public parking, open all day. In front of the sports center of the city. The sports center has a bar, a source of drinking water.

title: (46730) Gandia - 768 Plaça Numero 6
description: Parking at the edge of the beach, shower at 50 meters. No other service but this car park is much better than the one just above!

title: (46012) El Saler - 3 Paseo de la Dehesa
title_short: (46012) El Saler - 3 Paseo de la Dehesa
description: Located next to a closed Estibador restaurant, but a small bar open this Sunday, the parking lot is cemented and almost flat. Very quiet to spend the night compared to the hustle and bustle in the parking lot next door. Just a parking lot but next to the sea!

title: (46012) València - Unnamed Road
description: We parked only during the day, so we could take the bus to visit Valência. When we return around 5pm the A/C was been stolen. The 2 back windows were broken, and stolen our electric skooter from inside the A/C.

title: (46728) Barx - CV-675
description: Nice place to take a picnic and to walk a bit.

title: (46660) Manuel - 52 Plaça Numero 2
description: Great area, municipal swimming pool. 200 meters from the town, it has a good restaurant, bars, supermarket. Unregulated area, nice surroundings. 10-7-2020

title: (46220) Picassent - 118 Disseminat Polígon 38
description: Parking area, near the Mercadona, a quiet place, near the exit to the A7 and V31, nearby there is a field where you can take the dogs.

title: (46730) Gandia - 11 Carrer Ribera Baixa
description: Public parking near a natural beach, if it is not high season you can park at the end of the street, next to the beach. Beach showers and footbaths. Bars and bakeries at 300 mts.Zone of windsurfing, kite surfing and paddle surfing when going out to the beach

title: (46012) Valencia - 407 Carrera del Riu
description: Very comfortable and flat parking very close to the beach.

title: (46730) Grau i Platja - 10 Avinguda del Nord
title_short: (46730) Grau i Platja - 10 Avinguda del Nord
description: Quiet area to park, with shops, park, summer cinema, and 150 m from the beach

title: (46660) - 9042 Plaça Numero 1
description: Nice place in the middle of nature next to a sports area where there are toilets, showers and drinking water. there is a small bar in the sports area and a 5 minute walk you are in the city where you have all kinds of services, super market, bakery restaurants.

title: (46267) Gabarda - 151 CV-5590
description: Landscaped recreational area between poplars, willows and elms located next to the Puente del Rey, a civil engineering work carried out at the end of the 18th century and which was never finished. It can be visited at any time because it is outdoors in an environment surrounded by orange groves. There is a recreation area for the walk and it is part of a small cycle path or greenway that borders the course of the Júcar river. There is also an old brick kiln area accessed by a pedestrian ramp and near the bridge is a small amphitheater.

title: (46012) València - 153C Cami de Muntanyars
description: Free and quiet off-season parking in the area next to the popular beach. A dirt car park, a paid cement car park in season just before and another one at the roundabout. Please note that the town hall of Valencia has issued an order prohibiting all vehicles of the habitable type from parking in the city, under penalty of being fined. Motorhomes are tolerated during the day

title: (46012) València - 134 Cami de Muntanyars
description: Beach parking and restaurant. no signs prohibiting staying overnight. ideal for van.

title: (46910) Alfafar - 29 Carrer Rabisancho
description: Gas station with water station, car wash and very friendly service

title: (46838) Pinet - 6 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking on public road adjacent to municipal sports facilities on the outskirts of the village of Pinet. No through traffic Public fountain Picnic area with tables and benches. Public barbeque area. Children's play area. Public swimming pool with outdoor showers in summer (registration required). Small shop and bar in village.

title: (46012) València - 353 Carrera Rio
description: Comfortable place to park motorhomes, caravans or boats of any size. Safe, close to the city of Valencia and with a bus stop 300 meters away, beach just 200 meters away.

title: (46012) València - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the beach where we spent a great night out of season next to 2 other coaches. Very nice restaurant nearby. Only the bike path separates us from the beach

title: (46267) Gavarda -
description: Small paved dead end in the middle of the orange trees.

name: La Naranja campsite
title: (46730) La Naranja campsite
description: La Naranja campsite is ideal for spending a few days on the beach in Gandia. We offer spacious plots in the middle of nature. The campsite has drainage services and is 800 meters from the coastline. We have showers, WC, pool and bar (seasonal). La Naranja campsite is ideal for spending a few days on the beach in Gandia. We offer spacious plots in the middle of nature. The campsite has drainage services and is 800 meters from the coastline. We have showers, WC, pool and bar (seasonal).

title: (46012) València - 37 Cami de Muntanyars
description: Parking 50m from the beach. Services ok, bar and restaurant nearby

title: (46270) Castelló - 15E Sc 13 del Ppi el Pla II
title_short: (46270) Castelló - 15E Sc 13 del Ppi el Pla II
description: Industrial area. parking on the right or left in line between the trucks which also sleep there. peaceful nights.

address.street: 15E Sc 13 del Ppi el Pla II

title: (46910) Valencia - 5I Calle Sector 1 Ab
description: Ikea carpark, surface carpark has no height limit. Felt very safe leaving the van for a day out in Valencia centre. Massanassa train station 10 mins walk, 10 mins travel time and 3.50euros return. Ikea toilets, cafes and free WiFi - (coffee free with Ikea family card). Small play park across road near entrance. Very cheap fuel station which you will walk past between the parking and train station. (Oct 2019 - E1.06 per litre for diesel.)

title: (46270) Villanueva De Castellón - 1 Plaça Poligono 10
description: Parking at the start of the hike. Small street with paddling pool to cool off.

title: (46270) - 11F Sc 13 del Ppi el Pla II
title_short: (46270)  - 11F Sc 13 del Ppi el Pla II
description: Empty Industrial Area... good for a night.

address.street: 11F Sc 13 del Ppi el Pla II

title: (46470) Catarroja - 20 Avinguda Generalitat Valenciana
description: Laundry with very convenient access at the same gas station.

title: (46910) Alfafar - 4A Calle Profesora Ana Rojo
description: Simple location, no service. Trash cans nearby. There is plenty of parking on the side streets and businesses open around 8 a.m.
